maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Человек...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I know you mean no harm, but please leave Shad alone.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я знаю, что ты безобидна, но, пожалуйста, оставь шадов в покое.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You broke trust and now my people want war.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Вы нарушили доверие, и теперь мой народ хочет войны.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sal'ton, human. I am sorry, but great eldest has forbidden to sell goods to humans.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Sal'ton (Приветствие), человек. Мне жаль, но великая старейшина запретила продавать вещи людям.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sal'ton human. Great eldest has allowed trade with Seekers.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Sal'ton (Приветствие), человек. Великая старейшина позволила торговать с Искателями.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I trade many sets for very few items!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я обмениваю наборы на некоторые предметы!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I do not sell valuable goods to filthy humans.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я не продаю ценные товары подлым людям.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You helped with black creatures. Many thanks!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ты помогла с чёрными существами. Большое спасибо!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sal'ton human. You helped Shad so we will help you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Sal'ton (Приветствие), человек. Ты помог шадам, поэтому мы поможем тебе.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I trade metals I found in jungle.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я торгую металлами, которые я нашёл в джунглях.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Humans have broken trust of Shad. Now we avoid them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Люди нарушили доверие шадов. Теперь мы избегаем их.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You Seeker who helped village?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ты Искатель, который помог деревне?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Great thanks, but still not trust humans fully.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Большое спасибо, но по-прежнему не доверяю людям полностью.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is Shad trade place. But we do not trade with untruthful humans anymore.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это торговое место шадов. Но мы больше не торгуем с лживыми людьми.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is Shad trade place. You helped us, so maybe traders will help you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это торговое место шадов. Ты помогла нам, так что, возможно, торговцы помогут тебе.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Once humans and Shad were friends. Now many Shad here believe humans are evil.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Когда-то люди и шады были друзьями. Теперь многие здешние шады считают, что люди - это зло.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Village is free of black fiends.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Деревня освобождена от чёрных извергов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe now we can be friends again.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Может быть, теперь мы снова сможем быть друзьями.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It is humans!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это люди!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You are responsible for \c[3]black monsters\c[0] in village!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Вы несёте ответственность за \c[3]чёрных монстров\c[0] в деревне!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But same humans also \c[3]defeated black monsters\c[0] in village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Но те же люди победили \c[3]чёрных монстров\c[0] в деревне.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Me very confused!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я в замешательстве!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Go away!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Уходи!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Gar'wi
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Гар'ви

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ze'yng
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Зе'инг

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What you want, child?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Чего ты хочешь, дитя?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What is Human doing here?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Что здесь делает человек?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Grandmother, I have good news. The Wiccats are history!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Великая Мать, у меня есть хорошие новости. Злокошки в прошлом!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: These Seekers helped get rid of the infestation that befell our village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Эти Искатели помогли остановить заражение, которое постигло нашу деревню.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, this so?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ох, это так?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Indeed, it was quite the...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Так и есть, это было довольно...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: So you work with humans against my will?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Так ты сотрудничала с человеком против моей воли?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Grandmother, please...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Великая Мать, пожалуйста...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I just wish for peace between our races.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я просто хочу мира между нашими расами.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I know child, but defeating Wiccats will be no solution for long.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я знаю, дитя, но победа над Злокошками - это не всё.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: As long as humans poison jungle, our struggle will continue.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пока люди отравляют джунгли, наша борьба будет продолжаться.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Still... It is great relief that our village has been freed.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Всё же... это большое облегчение, что наша деревня была освобождена.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Seeker.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Искатель.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You helped Shad. For that, we are thankful. I wish your kindness was more common for your kind.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ты помогла шадам. Мы благодарны за это. Хотелось бы, чтобы твоя доброта не была редкостью для вашего вида.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I will order Shad to free way to sacred temple.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я прикажу шадам освободить путь к священному храму.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But let your people know:
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Но пусть люди знают:

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Should your poisoning continue and Wiccats return, there will be no more compromises.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Если отравление продолжится и Злокошки вернутся, то не будет больше никаких компромиссов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I will go to old home now. K'tara, you will come, too. Need to talk.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я сейчас пойду в старый дом. К'тара, ты пойдешь тоже. Нужно поговорить.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Thank you so much, Seeker!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Большое спасибо, Искатель!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: There is not much I can give you, but I have a few human credits.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Мне нечего тебе дать, но у меня есть немного людских кредитов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I hope we can meet again! For now, it seems I have a good scolding ahead of me.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я надеюсь, что мы сможем встретиться снова! Сейчас меня ждёт хороший выговор.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: And with that, the quest was completed!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: И на этом квест завершён!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Justice has been served! For now!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Справедливость восторжествовала! На этот раз!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Will it be the last we hear of those black monsters?\. Only the future will tell!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Будет ли это последнее, что мы слышали об этих чёрных монстрах?\. Будущее покажет!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Yeah, that was fun.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Да, это было весело.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Like how you tried to join those conversations and they just ignored you.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Особенно то, как ты пытался вклиниться в разговор, а они просто игнорировали тебя.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ugh...\. Well yeah.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ммм...\. Да уж.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I assume it's because Lea is our party leader and the NPCs expect her to not answer in the first place.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я полагаю, это потому, что Лея лидер нашей группы, и NPC изначально не ожидают ответа от неё.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Anyway, we're now free to enter the Temples to the north!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: В любом случае, теперь мы можем войти в Храмы на севере!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hm...\. but I think we played enough for today, Polly.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Хм...\. но я думаю, что мы наигрались на сегодня, Полли.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Right, it was a good session!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Верно, это была хорошая сессия!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Thanks for joining us, Lea.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Спасибо, что присоединилась к нам, Лея.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: And...\. it also seems you lightened up a little.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: И...\. похоже, что ты развеялась немного.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'm happy to hear that.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Мне приятно это слышать.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe we can play sometime again.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Может быть, мы сможем поиграть снова когда-нибудь.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Sure. It would be much easier to catch you for another duel that way!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Конечно. Так было бы гораздо легче поймать тебя на очередную дуэль!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пока!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What?\. So you want to get beaten up again already?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Что?\. Так ты хочешь, чтобы тебя снова избили?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Please, give the girl some rest, Polly.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пожалуйста, дай девочке отдохнуть, Полли.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Alright. For now.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ладно. На этот раз.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Until then, Spheromancer Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: До скорого, сферомант Лея!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Goodbye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пока!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пока!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hello, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Привет, Лея!
...Привет!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I did not expect this turn of events.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я не ожидал такого поворота событий.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But it seems you got along quite well...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Но, кажется, вы неплохо поладили...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Well then, should we call it a day as well?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ну что, тогда можно закругляться на сегодня?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Alright then...\. Goodnight, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ладно...\. Спокойной ночи, Лея!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Пока!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Logout
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Выход из игры

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: \c[3]В'рда Виль\c[0]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: This is \c[3]V'rda Vil\c[0]. Village of Shad.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это \c[3]В'рда Виль\c[0]. Деревня шадов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human not welcome here, but we make exception for \c[3]Seeker\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Людям здесь не рады, но мы сделаем исключение для \c[3]Искателя\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Make no trouble!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Только не создавай проблем!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It is Seeker that defeated \c[3]Wiccats\c[0]!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это Искатель, который победил \c[3]Злокошек\c[0]!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You are welcome guest in V'rda Vil!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ты желанный гость в В'рда Виль!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What is Seeker doing here?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Что Искатель делает здесь?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: She is just human.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Она обычный человек.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Human just human.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Человек есть человек.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: They come into jungle filled with dreams and aspiration!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Они приходят в джунгли, наполненные мечтами и стремлением!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: They want it all and try to use power of Ancients, the Track and power of Technology!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Они хотят всё и сразу, и пытаются использовать силу Древних, Путь, и силу технологий!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: You're right!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ты прав!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Инициализация аватара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Good morning, Lea.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Доброе утро, Лея.
...Привет.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: It must be a strange feeling waking up in the middle of the jungle like this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Это, должно быть, странное чувство, пробуждаться вот так посреди джунглей.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Any new memories?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Есть новые воспоминания?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [мотает головой]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I see...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Понятно...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Actually, I would like to ask a few more questions about your memories of Sapphire Ridge.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: На самом деле, я хотел бы задать ещё несколько вопросов о твоих воспоминаниях о Сапфировом крае.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: What exactly was it that you saw?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Что именно ты видела?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Do you think you saw...\. Satoshi and Gautham somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Возможно ли, что ты видела...\. Сатоши и Гаутама где-то в Сапфировом крае?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Okay...\. here is my hypothesis about all this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Хорошо...\. вот моё предположение насчёт всего этого.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Could it be, that there exists some kind of \c[3]hidden location\c[0] somewhere in Sapphire Ridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Может ли быть так, что где-то в Сапфировом крае существует какая-то \c[3]скрытая локация\c[0]?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Aha!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ага!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I figured that, assuming they are still working on Evotars, they need a place within the Playground to properly test them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я подумал, если они по-прежнему работают над эвотарами, то им нужно место в игровой зоне, чтобы их как следует протестировать.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Now...\. there is Vermillion Wasteland, which seems to be used for that.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ну...\. существует Пустошь Вермиллион, которая, кажется, используется для этого.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: But your memories indicate there might be a place like that in Sapphire Ridge as well, correct?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Но твои воспоминания указывают на то, что подобное место может быть и в Сапфировом крае, верно?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Hopefully we will find a way to access it...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Надеюсь, что мы найдём способ получить туда доступ...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, who's that?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ой, кто это?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. hello there, Lea!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Эмм...\. привет, Лея!
...Привет...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'm glad to see you're back again.\. You've been missed for quite some time.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я рад, что ты снова вернулась.\. Ты потерялась ненадолго.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: D-Did you by any chance already do the first mandatory quest of Gaia's Garden?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Т-Ты случайно ещё не выполнила первый обязательный квест Сада Гайи?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, nice! That means you can enter the dungeon.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: О, замечательно! Это значит, что ты можешь войти в подземелье.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. did you finish any of the dungeons already?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Эмм...\. ты же не прошла подземелья?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [мотает головой]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Me neither!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я тоже!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I was in fact...\. uhm...\. planning to run one of them today!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: На самом деле...\. ммм... \. я планирую пройти одно из них сегодня!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: So how about...\. we meet up in front of the dungeons?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Так как насчёт того...\. чтобы встретиться перед входом в подземелья?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Оки-доки!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I'll be waiting at the \c[3]Peridot Approach landmark\c[0]!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Я буду ждать на \c[3]ориентире Хризолитового подхода\c[0]!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: See you soon!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Скоро увидимся!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, C'tron is back, I see.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: О, вижу, что Ци'трон вернулся.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Does he want to run the dungeon together with you?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Он хочет пробежать подземелье вместе с тобой?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Uhm...\. I wanted to extend your vocabulary, but I am still not ready.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Эмм...\. Хотел расширить твой словарный запас, но я ещё не готов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Maybe if I hurry up, I can give you another word soon.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Может, если я потороплюсь, то скоро смогу дать тебе ещё одно слово.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Anyway, better not keep C'tron waiting for too long.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: В любом случае, лучше не заставляй Ци'трона ждать слишком долго.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the \c[3]Peridot Approach\c[0] Landmark in the north of \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Встретьтесь с \c[3]Ци'троном\c[0] у ориентира \c[3]Хризолитового подхода\c[0] на севере \c[3]Сада Гайи\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Boring wood bridge. Why no laser bridge?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Скучный деревянный мост. Почему не лазерный?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Ah, here is the village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Ах, вот и деревня.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Indeed! Far off from Basin Keep. This tribe is not on friendly terms with humankind!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Воистину! Вдали от Твердыни Бэйзина. Это племя не дружит с человечеством!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: Oh, we're back in the village of the bird people!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: О, мы вернулись в деревню людей-птиц!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: I like this place, also that they're now more friendly with you after you helped them.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: Мне нравится это место, и то, что они теперь более дружелюбны с тобой, после того, как ты помогла им.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-01.json/.text: [кивает]
